room_title: Escape room "The Disappearance of Albert Mason" by 1 Hour to Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
room_description:
In the sleepy heart of our small town, local Albert Mason was reported missing Thursday morning. Relatives say they have neither seen nor heard from the reformed criminal in a little over a week. Detective Ray Reynolds provided us with the following statement: 
“I remember Albert Mason well from his time spent at the station. He really came a long way. We were all surprised to see his name resurface in such an unfortunate context. We have a list of suspects and are working as hard as we can but quite honestly, we’ve hit a wall. Albert’s family is offering anyone with evidence towards this case who comes forward by midnight a reward for their valuable and speedy information.”
Are your investigative skills enough to crack the case and claim your reward in this story-based experience?
